Identification_Area.title: ULYSSES JUPITER EPAC PRTL3 SECTORED PROTON FLUX 1 HR V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Drolias B., J. Quenby, A. Witcombe, A. Korth, E. Keppler, J.B. Blake, Numerical simulations of non-adiabatic particle motions in the Jovian magnetosphere. Comparisons with Ulysses observations. Proc. 24th Intern. Cosmic Ray Conf., Roma, Italy, 1995.
Keppler, E., N. Krupp, The charge state of helium in the Jovian magnetosphere: a possible method to determine it, Planet. Space Sci., accepted for publication, 1995.

Keppler, E., J.B. Blake, M. Franz, A. Korth, N. Krupp, J.J. Quenby, M. Witte, and J. Woch , An overview of energetic particle measurements in the Jovian magnetosphere with the EPAC sensor on Ulysses, Science, 257, 1553-1557, 1992.

Krupp, N., Drei-dimensionale Richtungsverteilungen und relative Haufigkeiten energiereicher Ionen in der Magnetosphare des Jupiter, Dissertation zur Erlangung des Grades eines Dr.rer.nat., Universitat Braunschweig, 1994. MPAE-W-100-94-11.

Krupp, N., E. Keppler, A. Korth, M. Franz, A. Balogh, and M.K. Dougherty, Three-dimensional particle anisotropies in and near the plasma sheet of Jupiter observed by the EPAC experiment onboard the Ulysses spacecraft, Planet. Space Sci., 41, No. 11/12, 953-966, 1994.

Krupp, N., E. Keppler, A. Korth, M. Franz, M.K. Reuss, A. Balogh, and M.K. Dougherty, Ion measurements in the Jovian magnetosphere by the Ulysses EPAC experiment: A comparison between dawn and dusk sectors, Adv. Space Res., 16, (4)183-(4)186, 1995.

Schulz, M., J.B. Blake, S.M. Mazuk, A. Balogh, M.K. Dougherty, R.J. Forsyth, E. Keppler, J.L. Phillips, and S.J. Bame, Energetic-Particle, Plasma, and Magnetic-Field Signatures of a Poloidal Pulsation in Jupiter's Magnetosphere, Planet. Space Sci., 41, 963, 1993.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: ULYSSES JUPITER EPAC PRTL3 SECTORED PROTON FLUX 1 HR V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: ULYSSES JUPITER EPAC PRTL3 SECTORED PROTON FLUX 1 HR V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains Ulysses Energetic Particle Composition Experiment (EPAC) 1 hour averaged sectored proton flux data from the Ulysses Jupiter encounter 1992-Jan-25 to 1992-Feb-28. These data were recorded by Proton-Rate Sectored Telescope 3 (PRTL3).
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set contains Ulysses Energetic Particle Composition Experiment (EPAC) 1 hour averaged sectored proton flux data from the Ulysses Jupiter encounter 1992-Jan-25 to 1992-Feb-28. These data were recorded by Proton-Rate Sectored Telescope 3 (PRTL3).
Data ==== The file names for ULYSSES-KEP Experiment data files are:
Tyydoy.TAB
These are ASCII files. The data entries in the files are always single precision float values containing one hour averages in
Flux / (s cm^2 sr)
starting at midnight for each day. The corresponding times are integers indicating start of average. The entries are separated by blanks. Then the total length of the ASCII records are: 130 Bytes with 24 records per file. Bad or absent data are flagged with -9.99999e+10.
The data entries include:
PRTL3 Proton-Rate Sectored (~500-1000 keV) Telescopes 2 and 3, Sectors 1-8
The record structure is as follows:
1 character string (24 Bytes) with the format
yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ yyyy = year mm = month dd = day hh = hours mm = minutes ss.sss = seconds
8 reals (13 Bytes, e.g. -1.23456E+03) for
PRTL3 (8 sectors)
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= None provided. For more information regarding the confidence level of the data set please contact:
ERHARD KEPPLER Max-Planck-Institut fur Aeronomie Postfach 20 37189 Katlenburg-Lindau GERMANY Phone: 49-555-697-9296 Fax: 49-555-697-9240 Internet: keppler@pgate2.mpae.gwdg.de
